title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XXI, subch. D, pt. 1050 - Rules Governing The Conduct And Safety Of The Public In The Use Of The Facilities Of New York City Transit Authority And Manhattan And Bronx Surface Transit Operating Authority
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XXI, subch. D, pt. 1050 - Rules Governing The Conduct And Safety Of The Public In The Use Of The Facilities Of New York City Transit Authority And Manhattan And Bronx Surface Transit Operating Authority

§ 1050.1 - Authorization and purpose
§ 1050.2 - Definitions
§ 1050.3 - Construction

§ 1050.5 - Property and equipment
§ 1050.6 - Use of the transit system
§ 1050.7 - Disorderly conduct
§ 1050.8 - Weapons and other dangerous instruments
§ 1050.9 - Restricted areas and activities
§ 1050.10 - Fines and penalties
§ 1050.11 - Ejectment
§ 1050.12 - Persons authorized to issue notices of violation

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XXI, subch. D, pt. 1050

Statutory authority: Public Authorities Law, §§1203-a, 1204-a, 1205, 1205-a, 1209-a, 1266

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
